articles.author: Lim Hui Jie
articles.title: Hong Kong stocks tumble 2% as Asia markets fall, Nikkei halts winning streak - CNBC
articles.description: Japanese stocks, which have been on a record-breaking rally since the start of the year, slipped lower.
articles.content:

Hong Kong led declines in Asia-Pacific markets on Tuesday, with Japanese stocks also halting their record-breaking rally that has seen ben… [+1603 chars]
